oai_dc:dc.dc:title: framed money belt, sash, handkerchief
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Framed sash, money belt, and handkerchief of Pvt. Newton James Kimbro, Co. B, 17th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. The family story indicates that Kimbro was killed by cannon fire in a friendly fire incident on June 16, 1864. Kimbro was born on December 1, 1837.; He married Elizabeth S. Williams KimbroJanuary 26, 1858.
